hymn.title: Diligence, Faithfulness
hymn.category: Principles on How to Be a Proper Human Being—General

layout.singingstanza: Dil -- i -- gence, faith -- ful -- ness, Per -- se -- ver -- ance stands the test. Dil -- i -- gence, faith -- ful -- ness, Per -- se -- ver -- ance, YES!

lyrics.stanza: Diligence, faithfulness, Perseverance stands the test. Diligence, faithfulness, Perseverance, YES!
